description: This file defines the TokenClient class, which acts as a stub facade for gRPC client interactions related to token retrieval in the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. The class provides two methods to get platform and auth tokens, currently unimplemented and returning false.

classes.name: TokenClient
classes.description: A stub class providing an interface to retrieve platform and auth tokens for a specific application.

methods.name: GetPlatformToken
methods.description: Attempts to retrieve a platform/distributor token, currently returns false and sets errMsg.

methods.name: GetAuthToken
methods.description: Attempts to retrieve an auth token, currently returns false and sets errMsg.
